channel.title: Tools on Equilaterus
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Equilaterus

item.title: Released functional library for .Net Core
item.description: Write elegant and testeable solutions on C# using a Monadic Framework. Our free and open source library enables funcional power in ASP Core.

item.title: Released CLI Tools for Powershell
item.description: We have released a new solution to make easier than ever writing Powershell utilities.

item.title: Released Windows-SSD
item.description: Powershell scripts to automate symbolic link generation for SSD units on Windows.

item.title: Compress your images without lossing quality
item.description: We have released a friendly Windows Application that compress images achieving excellent results.
